header.menu.title: My portfolio
about.title:
Hi, I´m Alexis. 
 I am an Information Systems Engineer and I love technology
about.description:
I am {{age}} years old and I was born in Argentina. 
 I studied Information Systems Engineering at Technological University of Cordoba, Argentina from 2015 to 2021. 
 I like challenges and to learn new things constantly.
experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.description: Let me show you my work experiences
experiences.mp.title: Mercado Pago
experiences.mp.description: Mercado Pago is the Fintech number one on America Latina, and belongs to Mercado Libre. This platform let you charge by Internet through diferents options: email, social media, web site or smart phones.
experiences.mp.job.description:
I am working as a Software Engineer in a project called "Credit Card".
 My role in the team is "Backend Software Engineer" and I am in charge of planning, directing, executing and controlling the analysis, design, development, implementation and testing of software components.
 Also, I work in Frontend making a customer service application. The main technologies are React, Java and Go.
experiences.freelance.title: Freelance
experiences.freelance.description: Freelancer, or freelance worker, are terms commonly used for a person who is self-employed and not necessarily committed to a particular employer long-term.
experiences.freelance.job.description: In 2020 I was working in the development of an omni-channel mobile platform. The main technology is React Native.
experiences.personal.title: Telecom Personal
experiences.personal.description: Personal is a telecommunication company that operates operate in all Argentina through Telecom.
experiences.personal.job.description: I worked in a project R+D (Research plus Development) in the Architecture area. In this project, I learned about many new technologies and frameworks. I was in charge of researching, comparing, documentation and exposition about different topics. Also, I participated in the development of an internal web applications for the automation area. The main technologies were Node, Java and React.
experiences.claro.title: Claro
experiences.claro.description: Claro is a set of telecommunication services around Latinoamerica and is property of America Movíl.
experiences.claro.job.description: I worked in a project of customer service. I was in charge of maintaining and developing new features in the web application which let operators sell smartphones and accessories to the final user. The main technologies were Java and Oracle
